ygData.subject: Snow Tech Detected.
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor continued to look at Prowl, seeming to wait for him to get her back towards the Cybertronian Fire. Occasionally looking towards Fiararm. Iris

Subject: Snow Tech Detected.
Date: Mon, 04 Dec 2000 17:42:01 -0800
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
Message-ID: <F26uegNu0jXuMeAXOmm0000da39@...>
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Dec 2000 01:42:01.0322 (UTC) FILETIME=[900E1CA0:01C05E5C]
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* Iron Raptor continued to look at Prowl, seeming to wait for him to get her 
back towards the Cybertronian Fire. Occasionally looking towards Fiararm.
Iris slowly walked up to the small group of three as they stood there, 
wondering just what was taking so long for them to get their tails in gear. 
Her red armor flashing in the late noon light.

Iron Raptor tooked towards Firearm again and was about to ask him if he 
would be so kind as to take Iris back to base when a voice blared over her 
intercom, finding that the voice was rather familier...and she almost felt a 
sense of annoyance at the sound of the voice.( Snow Tech )*

< I know that voice...I just can't...remem...>

* Just then, as she began to finish the thought it came to her, she knew ho 
that voice beloned to!
SNOWTECH!!
He was an old friend of hers, one that she hadn't seen since...slag knew how 
long.
But Iron Raptor rolled her eyes and retracted the visor and face plate so 
that her face was viasble from the helm, looking towards Prowl.*

" I know who that was."

* She had to speak outloud so that Firearm would know what she was talking 
about, also, it was a good thing to do that once in a while so that her 
voice-box wasn't weakened so that she would never be able to use it.
Besides, all that mind talk had given her a headache.
But then Iron Raptor looked at Prowl, Iris and Firearm all in turn.*

" His name is Snow Tech, most likely there'll be a fembot with him named 
Shadow Cat. Borther and sister. Old friends of mine."

* She simply shrugged then then tapped a Maximal mark on the flat of her 
chest, which was simply a com-link built into the armor.
She opened it to all Maximal frequencies.*

" All Maximals, this is Iron Raptor. No doubt you cave recieved a 
transmission by an unknown signature, please remain where you are, I'll 
check this out. After doing so I'll bring the new comrad and return to base.
Besides that, if you are not already at the meeting, this is the last time I 
will say this; get there.
That is all."

* And with that she simply deactivated the link and then looked at Prowl, 
thinking to him despite the pain in her head.*

< I need to get at the location of Snow Tech's ship. Quickly. I need you to 
fly me there, please?>

* Then, she turned towards Firearm.*

" Firearm, I need to tend to the new Maximals, could you pleas take Iris 
back to base? Then wait for my return in the room where the meeting is being 
held...please?"

* Iris opened her mouth to protest but with a stern look from Iron Raptor 
she quickly closed it, simply passing her a good glare.*

IRIS: < If you get hurt I'll shove my foot so hard up your ass you'll be 
caughing up rust for a week.... You know very well that a new ship will 
attract more attention then just from Maximals.>

IR: < You know that I can handle it, besides, with these new modes Prowl and 
myself are basically a two bot army.>

IRIS: < No, you two are far from an army. Niether of you know those bodies, 
you're still learning. And that auto-body defence system of yours, the one 
which seemes to tajke controle of your body, will only last as long as you 
remain blind to it's abilities.>

IR: < How do you know all this?>

IRIS: < Let's just say that I wasn't given this body just because I asked 
for it. You two can't be trusted with those new bodies, not without someone 
to watch you. Make sure you're alright.>

IR: < You mean that you were made bot to look after Prowl and I?>

IRIS: < Basically. You two are like eager children. You plow along, never 
considering the conciquences, destroying everything in your paths.
You can't be left alone.>

IR: < So, you don't trust us with thise new bodies?>

IRIS: < It's not a matter of trust, it's a matter that if you can allow your 
body to be so inexperienced that it takes you over in battle, who knows 
whatelse it will force you to do?
Remember, that twisted beast mode is still inside you. One slip and you 
might be in the same condition you were in before all this slag happened.>

* Iron Raptor only sighed, looking towards Prowl, then Firearm.*

IR: < You're still going back to base. That's an order Iris.>

IRIS: < You don't command me, I'm none of your Maximals.>

IR: < No, but you're a part of my program which was removed as an advisory.>

IRIS: < Exactly. And I'm still advising. But I'll go back. Though, just 
remember now...I can hit back.>

* Iron Raptor looked at Iris with a cocked eye-brow, the bot compuer simply 
giving her her look back.
Iron Raptor then looked towards Prowl, stepping towards him.*

< Well, time to hit the wind, I guess.>
